entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon and risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
